coverages.coverage_name: Personal Accident (Accidental Death, Permanent Disablement, Third Degree Burns)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers Accidental Death, Permanent Disablement and Third Degree Burns occurring during the trip.

base_limits.type: Physiotherapist, Chinese Physician or Chiropractor (max $50 per visit)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers outpatient and hospitalisation medical expenses incurred overseas arising from accident or sickness, emergency dental expenses arising from accident, and accidental miscarriage. Includes treatment by specified alternative practitioners up to sub-limits.
Cashless services available at 740 clinics and hospitals in Japan via the 24-Hour Emergency Assistance Japan (EAJ) Hotline.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 2, GO Japan! Section; Page 3, Section 2 Header

coverages.coverage_name: Medical Expenses Incurred Upon Return to Singapore

base_limits.type: Physiotherapist, Chinese Physician or Chiropractor (max $50 per visit)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers follow-up treatment within 31 days from return date. If initial treatment was not sought overseas, treatment in Singapore must be sought within 48 hours from return date and continued for up to 31 days. Includes treatment by specified alternative practitioners up to sub-limits.

coverages.coverage_name: Emergency Medical Evacuation & Repatriation (Including Mortal Remains) Back to Singapore

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person (up to 70 years, Pre-existing Conditions)
Per Insured Person (above 70 years, Pre-existing Conditions)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers costs for emergency medical evacuation or repatriation of mortal remains back to Singapore. Includes cover for pregnancy-related complications and pre-existing medical conditions up to specified limits.
Provides a daily cash benefit for each complete day the insured person is hospitalised overseas.

coverages.coverage_name: Double Hospitalisation Allowance Whilst Overseas in ICU Arising from an Accident

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides a higher daily cash benefit for each complete day the insured person is confined to an Intensive Care Unit (ICU) overseas due to an accident. This benefit is payable instead of the standard Overseas Hospitalisation Allowance (Section 5).

coverages.coverage_name: Hospital Allowance for Hospitalisation in Singapore

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides a daily cash benefit for each complete day the insured person is hospitalised in Singapore upon return from the trip.
Covers additional accommodation and travel expenses incurred based on written medical advice from a qualified medical practitioner due to the insured person's accident or sickness during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Guardian for Return of Dependent Children

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers the costs for a next of kin to travel and accompany the insured person's unattended child(ren) back home in the event the insured person is hospitalised overseas.

coverages.coverage_name: Compassionate Visit by a Relative or Friend

base_limits.type: Due to your injury, sickness or disease (Per Insured Person)
Due to your injury, sickness or disease (Per Family)
In the event of your death (Per Insured Person)
In the event of your death (Per Family)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers travel and accommodation expenses for one relative or friend to visit the insured person if hospitalised overseas due to serious injury/sickness, or to arrange for repatriation in the event of death.

coverages.coverage_name: Loss or Damage to Baggage & Personal Effects

base_limits.type: Laptop computer/accessories or tablet device (Section B)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss or damage to personal baggage and effects during the trip. Subject to Section B limits, including per item, specific item (e.g., electronics, laptop, mobile phone), and aggregate limits.

base_limits.type: Loss of money resulting from theft (Section E)
Fraudulent use of credit card overseas

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers costs of replacing lost/stolen travel documents and loss of cash/traveller's cheques due to theft. Includes cover for fraudulent use of credit cards overseas. Subject to Section E limits.
Covers non-refundable travel/accommodation costs if the trip is cancelled or postponed due to Insured Events occurring within 30 days before departure.
Includes coverage for loss of frequent flyer or similar travel points used to purchase an airline ticket.
Covers the loss of un-utilised portion of prepaid travel costs and additional expenses incurred if the trip is cut short due to Insured Events, resulting in return to Singapore.

base_limits.type: Loss of un-utilised prepaid travel costs/expenses (Per Insured Person)
Loss of un-utilised prepaid travel costs/expenses (Per Family)
Cash benefit for un-utilised paid ticket cancellation (Per Insured Person)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss of un-utilised portion of prepaid travel costs and expenses whilst overseas due to Insured Events. Also provides a cash benefit if a pre-paid event ticket cannot be used due to an Insured Event.
Trip Disruption Cover provides up to $100 coverage for unused event tickets.

coverages.coverage_name: Financial Collapse of Licensed Tour Operators

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss of non-refundable or un-utilised prepaid travel costs and expenses for trip cancellation or curtailment occurring after the policy issue date due to the financial collapse of the licensed tour operator.
Covers the insured person's legal liability to pay compensation to a third party for accidental bodily injury or accidental property damage occurring during the trip.
Provides cash benefit for delay in arrival of checked-in baggage. Extended to cover delay if baggage is wrongly picked up by another passenger whilst overseas.

Provides cash benefit for delay of scheduled public transport. Payable for any cause outside the insured's control, based on actual arrival time versus original schedule. Covers all causes of unexpected delays beyond control.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 4, Section 19; Page 1 Overview; Page 2 Highlights

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides a one-off cash benefit if the insured person is denied boarding on a scheduled flight whilst overseas due to overbooking, and no alternative transport is provided within a specified time.
Provides cash benefit if the scheduled flight is deviated due to adverse weather conditions or landing at an alternative destination for emergency medical treatment of a fellow passenger.
Provides cash benefit for delay resulting from the hijacking of the public conveyance the insured person is travelling on.
Provides cash benefit if pre-booked hotel facilities become unavailable during the stay due to reasons like fire, flood, or other specified events.

Provides cash benefit if the insured person misses a confirmed onward connecting flight/journey due to the late arrival of the incoming confirmed connecting flight/journey, and no alternative is available within 6 hours.
Provides a cash benefit for each 48-hour period the insured person is unlawfully detained due to kidnapping during the trip.

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person (In aggregate for applicable Sections)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Extends cover under various sections (e.g., Personal Accident, Medical Expenses) to include losses arising from an Act of Terrorism, subject to an overall aggregate limit per person.

Provides cover for Accidental Death & Permanent Disablement if sustained as an innocent bystander due to war or civil war. The benefit payable is based on the limits specified in Section 1 (Personal Accident).

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person (In aggregate for applicable Sections)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Extends cover under various sections (e.g., Personal Accident, Medical Expenses) for incidents arising from participation in leisure underwater activities like scuba diving (if qualified or under supervision) and snorkelling, subject to an overall aggregate limit per person.

Covers the cost of necessary alternative accommodation if pre-booked accommodation becomes uninhabitable or is cancelled after the trip has commenced due to specified events (e.g., fire, natural disaster).
Covers additional costs for alternative travel arrangements if the original plans are disrupted due to specified insured events (e.g., natural disaster, strike).
Reimburses emergency telephone call charges incurred by the insured person due to an event covered under the policy (e.g., hospitalisation, loss of documents).
Covers the insurance excess or deductible amount the insured person becomes legally liable to pay in respect of loss or damage to a rented vehicle during the rental period.
Covers the cost of necessary reconstructive surgery, including skin transplantation, required as a result of accidental burns sustained during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Recuperation Allowance Due to Accidental Miscarriage

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides a lump sum cash benefit if the insured person suffers an accidental miscarriage during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Quarantine Allowance Due to 17 Infectious Diseases Upon Return to Singapore

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides a daily cash benefit if the insured person is required by law to be quarantined upon return to Singapore due to being diagnosed with one of the 17 specified infectious diseases (including SARS, Dengue, H1N1, MERS, Zika).

base_limits.type: Loss or damage of golf equipment

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss or damage to the insured person's golf equipment during the trip. Does not cover hole-in-one achievements, unused green fees, or damage to golf buggies under the GO Japan! plan.

Coverage under relevant sections (e.g., Personal Accident, Medical Expenses) includes participation in amateur sports such as tandem air sports (skydiving, hang-gliding, paragliding), snow-skiing, hot-air ballooning, bungee jumping, indoor rock climbing, and trekking up to 3,500m above sea level for all mountains. This is not a separate benefit limit but confirms inclusion in standard coverages.

coverages.coverage_name: Free and Automatic Extension of Policy

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: The policy period will be automatically extended for up to 14 days without additional premium if the return to Singapore is delayed due to injury, illness, quarantine, or the delay/cancellation of public conveyance preventing return by the original end date.
